snippet.title: Super Mario's Shroom Shines Escapade || New Name + Demo Reveal!
snippet.description:
How surprising! It appears Super Mario Newest Adventure is getting a BRAND NEW NAME.. And demo!!
Introducing... Super Mario's Shroom Shines Escapade! :D

The Demo's here!! Link : https://www.mediafire.com/folder/p90r2f73bojxw/Super+Mario's+Shroom+Shines+Escapade!+-+Demo 


Super Mario's Shroom Shines Escapade is a Mario Fangame made with Super Mario Bros X2. 
In this brand new adventure, Mario and his fellow friends must collect the mysterious yet powerful Shroom Shines to save the Mushroom Kingdom from Bowser's army! (Yes, once again! What were you expecting? This ain't about Thousand Year Doors!)


- My Twitter Account : TheKakiB
- The SMNA Logo was made by the talented Julius (Here's his Youtube channel) : https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCZR6FF3R2clsqSS0dH-JOfw
The brand new logo was made by good ol' me!
